room.name: Starter Tavern
room.description: You appear in a dark, smelly tavern. You can't pick out any specific conversation amongst the cacophony, but you're sure it's there. The exit to the street is to the west. There is a rusty lantern on the table in front of you. What looks like a door to a storeroom is to the north.

npc.name: Tommy
npc.description: a tall, scruffy man in a brown leather jerkin. He looks a little drunk, but otherwise harmless. He looks like he has something to say.
npc.intro: Name's Tommy the Lip, but you can call me Tommy. Welcome to the world of MiniMUD. I can answer most basic questions that new folks tend to ask.

result.description: You try to punch Tommy the Lip, but miss. Maybe he's not as drunk as he looks.
You push Tommy. He didn't appear to enjoy it as much as you did.

object.name: lantern
object.description: a standard oil-based lantern, covered in rust. It must not be important to anyone.

result.description: You push the lantern and it falls over.
You take the lantern and add it to your inventory

room.name: Main Street
room.description: You turn on to Main Street. There isn't much traffic this time of day. To the east is a loud, smelly tavern.

room.name: Storeroom
room.description: You quietly sneak into the storeroom. It is lined with the skulls of sacrificed animals. There is a pentagram painted on the floor in blood. You wonder what exactly is in the meat pie. To the south is the door back into the main Tavern.

item.name: lantern
item.description: a lantern. It's a bit rusty, but it still works.

quest_step.description: Tommy has asked you to pick up the lantern from the table.
quest_step.hint: type 'take lantern' to pick up the lantern.
